text: salamdeul jung-eneun jeohuineun hana nim-eul midnaida lago malhana geudeul i hananim-ui gil-eseo jaenan-eul danghaess eul ttaeneun geugeos-eul machi hananim-ui bag haelo saeng-gaghaneun jadeul-i issdeola geu leona junim-ui eunhyelo seungliga ileul ttaemyeon ulido neohuiwa hamkke iss-eossdo da lago malhanila geuleona hananim eun ingandeul-ui simjung-e issneun geosdeul-eul moleusineun bun-i anisila
